comments:
After project renaming we practically lose all previously created contexts. 

There should be some migration path, so user won't see errors like this for all editors opened on task activation.

Yes, this is a known side-effect of renaming.  I will plan to add a rewrite rule but only after 2.0 items that are critical to users and integrators are done.
Nice as it would be, this does not have enough priority.
